channel.title: CVE Feed for Becton Dickinson (BD) -- BD Synapsys™
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Becton Dickinson (BD) -- BD Synapsys™

item.title: CVE-2022-30277|2024-09-16T17:43:27.280Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%28bd%29 -- bd%20synapsys%E2%84%A2
item.description: BD Synapsys™, versions 4.20, 4.20 SR1, and 4.30, contain an insufficient session expiration vulnerability. If exploited, threat actors may be able to access, modify or delete sensitive information, including electronic protected health information (ePHI), protected health information (PHI) and personally identifiable information (PII).
